actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to stabilize the price of propane.

summary.text: Prohibits a refiner of petroleum products, in computing prices for propane, from apportioning to propane a greater percentage of the total product costs incurred by that refiner than the percentage that the total sales volume of propane of that refiner is to the total sales volume of all products refined by such refiner.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to stabilize the price of propane.
